entry.title: Accelerators | Microsoft US
entry.summary: Accelerators are repeatable solutions that can be quickly and easily implemented for specific business outcomes to accelerate transformation journey.

entry.title: ADF Synapse Ingestion Framework
entry.description: Speed up migration with ease of development and also use the same for production deployment.

entry.title: ADX IoT Analytics
entry.description: Azure Data Explorer can provide valuable insights into your IoT workloads.

entry.title: ADX Patient Monitoring
entry.description: Continuous patient monitoring to generate telemetry readings for two IoT consumer devices

entry.title: AI-Powered Call Center Intelligence (Modern Contact Center)
entry.description: Automates call transcriptions for real-time and previously recorded calls.

entry.title: AI-Powered Call Center Intelligence
entry.description: Automates call transcriptions for real-time and previously recorded calls.

entry.title: AI-Powered Insurance Claims Automation
entry.description: Reduce claims processing time and manual effort in end-to-end claims processing for better customer experience.

entry.title: AIoT - Inventory Lifecycle Management
entry.description: Drive outcomes related to building more agile factories, creating more resilient supply chains, and transforming workforces.

entry.title: AIoT
entry.description: Transform how people, devices, and data interact in daily life and work

entry.title: Automated Quality Inspection
entry.description: Inspect product quality at the point of manufacture on the assembly line in real-time.

entry.title: Azure Intelligent Recommendations
entry.description: Provide personalized product recommendations and telemetry insights.

entry.title: Azure OpenAI (ChatGPT)
entry.description: Harness the power of Azure OpenAI and ChatGPT, combined with dozens of Azure AI and Data services with a rapid POC tailored to customer.

entry.description: Collect data from every interaction in a feedback loop for optimization.

entry.description: Automate the deployment of a pre-populated Azure Purview demo environment.

entry.title: Demand Forecasting
entry.description: Determine future demand to optimize inventory, material and product orders.

entry.title: Digital Experience Solution
entry.description: Move the entire live stream process offsite and into the cloud.

entry.title: Document Process Automation
entry.description: Automate extraction of data from complex structured and unstructured documents to unlock insights.

entry.title: Factory & Worker Safety
entry.description: Azure Computer Vision infers product quality at the point of manufacture on the assembly line in real-time.

entry.title: Fraud Detection and Transaction Monitoring
entry.description: Identify risk of fraud or fraud associated activities.

entry.description: Multiply the productivity of your employees and cut down your IT support costs.

entry.title: Manufacturing Vision - AMD64
entry.description: Base code for the Manufacturing Vision Accelerator for AMD64 architecture.

entry.description: Hands-on-Lab to explore the functionality of Microsoft Purview and help you manage and govern your on-premises, multi-cloud and SaaS data.

entry.description: Simplify the fraud detection and reporting process.

entry.title: Predictive Maintenance
entry.description: Predict motor, equipment, and/or asset issues before they happen.

entry.title: Risk Classification and Loan Modeling
entry.description: Automate processes to ensure compliance with SBA guidelines.

entry.title: Smart Spaces Sustainability
entry.description: Optimize HVAC systems quickly and proactively for efficient and cost-effective energy use.

entry.title: Traffic Monitoring
entry.description: Deliver geospatial visualizations of road network performance and demand, travel time delay, and non-recurring congestion events.

entry.title: Workplace Intelligence for Human Resources
entry.description: Easily identify factors that influence productivity and engagement.

entry.title: Workplace Intelligence for Product Development Teams
entry.description: Uncover and leverage the key drivers of productivity and success for product development teams.
